types.doc: Create a new host group in LogicMonitor Portal

parameters.doc: The full path including all parent groups. Format: "/parentgroup/childgroup"
parameters.name: fullpath

parameters.doc: The long text description of a host group
parameters.name: description

parameters.doc: A hash where the keys represent the property names and the values represent the property values. (e.g. {"snmp.version" => "v2c", "snmp.community" => "public"})
parameters.name: properties

parameters.doc: Set alerting at the host group level. A value of false will turn off alerting for all hosts and subgroups in that group.  Valid values are `true`, `false`.
parameters.name: alertenable

parameters.doc: Allow the group to be add-only (only modifies the portal if the group does not exist), update (existing properties and location of the group are unaffected, append new properties), or overwrite (puppet control only)  Valid values are `add`, `update`, `overwrite`.
parameters.name: mode

types.name: logicmonitor_group

description:
This Puppet module allows you to manage collectors, hosts, and host groups 
	    in your LogicMonitor portal via Puppet.
name: logicmonitor-logicmonitor
author: Ethan Culler-Mayeno
